Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the MCD family (Mastoparan subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=2 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli JM109 (MIC=8 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Dominulin A and B two new antibacterial peptides identified on the cuticle and in the venom of the social paper wasp Polistes dominulus using MALDI-TOF, MALDI-TOF/TOF, and ESI-ion trap.
Literature.Reference: J Am Soc Mass Spectrom. 2006 Mar;17(3)376-383.
Literature.Author: Turillazzi S, Mastrobuoni G, Dani FR, Moneti G, Pieraccini G, la Marca G, Bartolucci G, Perito B, Lambardi D, Cavallini V, Dapporto L.

Literature.Title: Dominulin A and B: two new antibacterial peptides identified on the cuticle and in the venom of the social paper wasp Polistes dominulus using MALDI-TOF, MALDI-TOF/TOF, and ESI-ion trap.
Literature.Author: Pieraccini G.,Moneti G.,Dani F.R.,Mastrobuoni G.,Turillazzi S.
